did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Typescript of paper read before the Tucson Literary Club, Nov. 1933, Tucson, Ariz., concerning Ajo mining history.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Metallurgist and mining engineer; professor of administration of mineral industries, University of Arizona, 1926 to 1942.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into a chronological narrative.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Typescript of paper read before the Tucson Literary Club, Nov. 1933, Tucson, Ariz., concerning Ajo mining history.

item.subject: Copper mines and mining -- Arizona -- Pima County.
